trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定列表控件中显示使用模板的项。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Templates](#templates) - [Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [Display Direction and Layout](#display_direction_and_layout) - [Security](#security) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the DataList control to display a template-defined data bound list.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [模板](#templates) - [自定义 DataList 控件的外观](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [显示方向和布局](#display_direction_and_layout) - [安全](#security) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介绍使用 DataList 控件来显示模板定义的数据绑定的列表。

trans-unit.source: The DataList control supports selecting and editing.
trans-unit.target: DataList 控件支持选择和编辑。

trans-unit.source: ## Templates The contents of the DataList control can be manipulated by using templates.
trans-unit.target: # # 模板 DataList 控件的内容可以通过使用模板进行操作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the supported templates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了支持的模板。

trans-unit.source: |Template Name|Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: |模板名称 |说明 | |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>|如果定义，提供的内容和布局中 DataList 交替项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>|如果定义，内容和布局为项提供当前正在编辑中 DataList。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，`ItemTemplate`使用。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>|如果定义，提供的内容和布局页脚部分的 DataList。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，页脚部分将不会显示。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>|如果定义，提供的内容和布局 DataList 的标头部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>|Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the DataList.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，将不会显示的表头部分。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>|需 DataList 中的项提供的内容和布局的模板。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>|如果定义，提供的内容和布局 DataList 中当前选定项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A>|如果定义，提供的内容和布局 DataList 中项之间的分隔符。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.| At the very minimum, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> needs to be defined to display the items in the DataList control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，将不会显示分隔符。 | 至少，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>需要定义 DataList 控件中显示的项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the DataList control.
trans-unit.target: 其他模板可以用于提供自定义信息，请参阅 DataList 控件。

trans-unit.source: ## Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control The appearance of the DataList control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: # # 自定义可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性自定义 DataList 控件的外观 DataList 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: |Style Property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for alternating items in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the item being edited in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the footer in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the header in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the items in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected item in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the DataList control.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |说明 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|指定为交替 DataList 控件中的项的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>|指定在 DataList 控件中正在编辑的项的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>|DataList 控件中指定页脚的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>|DataList 控件中指定的标头的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>|DataList 控件中指定的项的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|DataList 控件中指定的选定项的样式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>|指定的样式 DataList 控件中的项之间的分隔符。 | 你还可以显示或隐藏的控件的不同部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||Shows or hides the footer section of the DataList control.| ||Shows or hides the header section of the DataList control.| ## Display Direction and Layout The display direction of a DataList control can be vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏 DataList 控件页脚部分。 | ||显示或隐藏 DataList 控件的标头部分。 | # # 显示方向和布局 DataList 控件的显示方向可以为垂直或水平。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the display direction.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性指定的显示方向。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The layout of the DataList control is controlled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DataList 控件的布局控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the DataList in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the DataList without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`将以表格的形式显示 DataList 时`RepeatLayout.Flow`显示 DataList 没有表结构。

trans-unit.source: ## Security The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information.
trans-unit.target: # # 安全`DataList`控件可以包含使用户能够输入信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全性的详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                              ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                                                                                                                                              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的交替项获取的样式属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternatingItemStyle 属性中的交替项提供自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the AlternatingItemStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定 AlternatingItemStyle 属性蓝色字体中, 重写红色字体指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|AlternatingItemStyle| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |优先 |样式属性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |AlternatingItemStyle | |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定的交替项的自定义样式，将放置`<AlternatingItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<AlternatingItemStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>代表交替的样式属性的对象中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的交替项模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemTemplate property to control the contents of alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternatingItemTemplate 属性来控制中交替项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由控制交替项的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定个交替项的模板，将放置`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>对象，其中包含为交替模板中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref>中的项单击按钮<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The CancelCommand event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 CancelCommand 事件时`Cancel`中的项单击按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the CancelCommand event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型处理程序 CancelCommand 事件集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性`-1`（以取消选择项），然后将重新绑定数据到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 文本不是 HTML 编码之前它将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.target: |优先 |样式属性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |EditItemStyle | |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定为编辑选定的项的自定义样式，将放置`<EditItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemTemplate property to control the contents of the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditItemTemplate 属性来控制为在中编辑选定的项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选择用于编辑由控制项的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定用于选择要编辑的项目的模板，将放置`<EditItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<EditItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control, defined in each template of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control, are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否的行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>控件中的每个模板定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制、 被提取和显示。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are specified by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>使用模板来指定控件时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你可以列出你想要在模板中显示的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template and display the rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: 也可以放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件模板中，并显示表的行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Use the ExtractTemplateRows property to specify whether the rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control defined in each template of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: ExtractTemplateRows 属性用于指定是否的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件中的每个模板定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件被提取和显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: All rows extracted from the templates of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a single table.
trans-unit.target: 从模板中提取的所有行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示在单个表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以从其他较小的表创建一个表并仍然维持的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for each template you want to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当此属性设置为`true`，你必须提供一个格式良好<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>想要包括在每个模板的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Only the rows of the tables will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 将显示仅表的行。

trans-unit.source: All other content in the template will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略模板中的所有其他内容。

trans-unit.source: You must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for this feature to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制此功能正常工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: When you create a cell for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to control the number of columns the cell spans.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to control the number of rows the cell spans.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> properties do not affect the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when this property is set to `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the rows of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control, defined in each template of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the grid line style for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的样式。

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|No grid lines.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays the horizontal grid lines.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays the vertical grid line.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines.| > [!NOTE] > This property only applies if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: |样式 |说明 | |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|没有网格线。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|显示水平网格线。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|显示垂直网格线。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|显示这两个水平和垂直网格线。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<HeaderStyle>` tag.

trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A>属性必须设置为`true`，此属性才可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.target: InitializeItem 方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and InitializeItem methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when any button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value.
trans-unit.target: 在中单击任何按钮时引发 ItemCommand 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件并通常用时必须具有自定义的按钮控件`CommandName`值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the server when an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control is created.
trans-unit.target: 服务器中的项上发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的项时引发 ItemCreated 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>创建控件，在往返过程和时将数据绑定到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemCreated 事件通常用于控制的内容和外观中某一行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is data bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定到某个项时将发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ItemDataBound event is raised after an item is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 项被绑定到的数据之后，将引发 ItemDataBound 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可为你提供访问的数据项，客户端上显示之前的最后机会。

trans-unit.source: After this event is raised, the data item is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件后，数据项目不再可用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> objects representing the individual items within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref>表示在控件内的各个项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to programmatically control the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用项集合以编程方式控制中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The Items collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 项集合不提供任何方法来添加或删除到集合的项。

trans-unit.source: However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以通过提供的处理程序来控制项的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only items bound to the data source are contained in the Items collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 仅绑定到数据源的项包含项目集合中。

trans-unit.source: The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中不包括页眉、 页脚和分隔符。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> objects representing the individual items within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref>表示内的单个项的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取为中的项的样式属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性提供的项自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the ItemStyle property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定 ItemStyle 属性红色字体，所有其他项将样式中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the ItemStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>重写 ItemStyle 属性中指定的红色字体的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在中显示的列数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的显示中的项的列数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set this property to `5`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in five columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果将此属性设置为`5`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件五个列中显示它的项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If this property is set to `0`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果此属性设置为`0`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件将显示在单个行或列中，基于值的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`的项显示在单个行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`的项显示在单个列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在中显示的列数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control are displayed in a single row or column, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>，表示中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件显示在单个行或列中，基于值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*>

trans-unit.source: The specified number of columns is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的列数是负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control displays vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件显示垂直或水平。

trans-unit.source: Use the RepeatDirection property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RepeatDirection 属性指定的显示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The number of columns displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 显示的列数始终由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，列表中的项是从上到下，加载的列中显示，然后从左到右，直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示三个列，如下所示下表中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |1|4|7| |2|5|8| |3|6|9| If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |&1; |&4; |&7; | |&2; |&5; |&8; | |&3; |&6; |&9; | 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，列表中的项显示在从左到右加载的行中，自上而下，直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件中的三个项，每行显示下表中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the control is displayed in a table or flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在表或数据流布局中显示控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RepeatLayout property to specify whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 适用属性用于指定是否中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示表中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> values that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>，支持的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>值</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, the items in the list are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`，列表中的项显示在表中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`, the items in the list are displayed without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`，列表中的项显示没有的表结构。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is displayed in a table, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> property to specify a grid line style.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件显示表中，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A>属性可指定网格线样式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the control is displayed in a table or in flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定表中或在数据流布局中是否显示控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the supported <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是支持之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存对控件的更改自页回发到服务器的时间视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段后。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element.
trans-unit.target: 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the SaveViewState method and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写 SaveViewState 方法并修改提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: 包含的更改的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref> command name.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref>命令名称。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectCommandName field to represent the `Select` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectCommandName 字段来表示`Select`命令名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的选定项的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to programmatically specify the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedIndex 属性以编程方式指定中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性来确定所选的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectedIndex property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> SelectedIndex 属性是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: To deselect an item, set the SelectedIndex property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择某个项目，请将 SelectedIndex 属性设置为`-1`。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is stored in control state.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 属性存储在控件状态。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的选定项的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是小于<xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取中选定的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItem property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object that represents the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedItem 属性来获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>表示中的选定的项的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 此对象然后用于访问所选的项的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> that represents the item selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> ，表示在中选择的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取中的选定项的样式属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于提供自定义样式中的选定项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 常见样式属性，可调整包括前景颜色、 背景色、 字体和单元格内的内容对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的样式增强的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 项中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件从一个项样式属性继承到另一个层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由层次结构中较高的项的样式属性继承层次结构中设置得较低的项的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性、 中的所有其他项样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件还具有红色字体。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以通过设置单个项的样式属性提供通用控件外观。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写继承的样式设置是通过设置其样式属性的层次结构中较高级别的项样式属性的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为蓝色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>属性，重写中指定的红色字体<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了从最高到最低的层次结构顺序。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|SelectedItemStyle| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |优先 |样式属性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |SelectedItemStyle | |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定选定项的自定义样式，将放置`<SelectedItemStyle>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<SelectedItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出内打开的样式特性`<SelectedItemStyle>`标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>包含中的选定项的样式属性的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于中的选定项的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItemTemplate property to control the contents of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: SelectedItemTemplate 属性用于控制所选的项的内容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项的外观由控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定选定项的模板，将放置`<SelectedItemTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<SelectedItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the footer section is displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowFooter property to specify whether the footer section is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the footer section by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, however this property is only examined when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，但此属性才检查时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate*>属性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property is used primarily by control developers.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> tag if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout*> is set to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>; otherwise, returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> tag.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control so they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪视图状态更改为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制以便将它们存储在控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写 TrackViewState 方法以将标记控件的视图状态的一部分开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref>中的项单击按钮<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 UpdateCommand 事件时`Update`按钮的单击某项。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the UpdateCommand event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型处理 UpdateCommand 事件更新数据，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>属性`-1`（以取消选择项），然后将重新绑定数据到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
